title: Google\Cloud\Dataflow\V1beta3\MountedDataDisk
name: MountedDataDisk
description:
Describes mounted data disk.

Generated from protobuf message google.dataflow.v1beta3.MountedDataDisk

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.data_disk
params.description: The name of the data disk. This name is local to the Google Cloud Platform project and uniquely identifies the disk within that project, for example "myproject-1014-104817-4c2-harness-0-disk-1".

methods.name: getDataDisk
methods.description:

This name is local to the Google Cloud Platform project and uniquely identifies the disk within that project, for example "myproject-1014-104817-4c2-harness-0-disk-1".
